title: 1909 Obak Horiz, 1910 Obak, T205 Merkle Polar Bear miscut, etc...

posts.post_title: 1909 Obak Horiz, 1910 Obak, T205 Merkle Polar Bear miscut, etc...
posts.post_content:
All prices include delivery. Paypal F&F Preferred. Please send me a PM if interested in anything.

1909 T212-1 Obak Boyce Horizontal (PR) - staining & tape on both ends. Still a presentable version of a very tough card. - $70.00

T205 Fred Merkle (FR) - Miscut back showing portions of three Polar Bear backs - $50.00

T207 Frank Schulte SGC 30 Recruit Back - $40.00

T205 Harry Krause (FR) - Hassan Back - $15.00

1910 Obak T212-2 Weed - Spokane (FR) w/ Gilliam Squires back stamp - $25.00
